title: Tigi Bedhead Hard Head Hairspray (6 Pack)
features: This maximum strength hairspray is the go-to hairspray for those who want to give their hair a strong, hard hold while providing lustering, light-catching shine.
description: One of the most popular of the Bed Head hair care products, the TIGI BH HARD HEAD HAIR SPRAY is a maximum hold hairspray that keeps your coif in perfect condition, no matter what. This long-lasting hairspray dries immediately and is scented with a berry and citrus fragrance. This product listing contains six bottles of TIGI BH HARD HEAD HAIR SPRAY.
